str2: So that, therefore, so then, so as to. From hos and te; so too, i.e. Thus therefore.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

str2: To give in marriage. From gamos; to espouse.

Of unknown origin; a maiden; by implication, an unmarried daughter.

str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Well, nobly, honorably, rightly. Adverb from kalos; well.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

Stronger, more excellent. Neuter of an alternate form of kreitton; better, i.e. Greater advantage.
